name: Tiki Soul
effectText: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Rock/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1800) (this card is also still a Trap). While this card is an Effect Monster, if another Trap Card you control that is a monster would be destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to your GY, you can Set it in the Spell & Trap Zone instead.
